Reviews.Title: A great camera!!!
Reviews.Author: H. Toribio "Fanatik4JC"
Reviews.Content: This camera was easy to use. It has plenty of features. The price at Amazon was unbeatable. You cant go wrong with this purchase. I bought two!

Reviews.Title: review on samsung nv4 8.1mp digital camera
Reviews.Author: Phillip A. Theze "Ptheze"
Reviews.Content: This is a really nice camera.  It has A music player which works very well.  i  love this camera

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Product is really great plus I can't beat the price with a stick. Shipping was faster than expected. The only thing that was off is they sent a shiny black camera instead of the silver one and I don't like the finger prints but that's such a minor detail for me. It's still a great camera.

Reviews.Title: good camer
Reviews.Author: tys memaw
Reviews.Content: Just received this camera and it very nice. Have taken a few pictures with it and found it very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and price!
Reviews.Author: Phil "Phil"
Reviews.Content: Got this as a replacement for a 'Kodak' digital camera that lasted less than a week.  Easy to use (especially) if you place it in the 'auto' mode.  The 'printed manual' covers alot but the 'cd' version on the installation disc covers alot more and answer most of your questions.  This camera was priced at $39.99 which was about $26.00 cheaper than the 'Kodak'.  Do recommend this Samsung Camera, great value!!

Reviews.Title: Exellent!
Reviews.Author: Eunmi Do
Reviews.Content: It is a comfortable. And it has a lot of functions. Its color is so good! I satisfyed because it is so good!

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Donna Walters
Reviews.Content: I was unsastified at first, because they sent me a camera with a bad battery.  The only thing is I had to purchase another battery. Other than that camera works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Evelyn Beiderbecke
Reviews.Content: The camera I received was black, but it is the same camera model in the picture so that's not a big deal. It takes great photos and I have gotten several compliments on it as well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung NV4 Camera did not work!
Reviews.Author: Karen Cattoor
Reviews.Content: The camera didn't work. Never even charged up! Now I don't know how to return it!! Please get back with me as soon as POSSIBLE! I do appreciate the fact that at least you did contact me... that is a plus on your side for sure!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and great pictures
Reviews.Author: Rosemarie Lockett
Reviews.Content: This camera is very easy to use and takes really nice pictures.  Very happy with the purchase.  Price was very affordable.

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: Bobby Digital
Reviews.Content: The camera i received was black instead of silver. This was a gift so it was kind of annoying, since the person explicitly wanted a cheap, silver camera. If it was for me I wouldn't have cared.The larger issue was that the camera was broken. It turned on but wouldnt take any pictures. I spent about 3 hours with Samsung troubleshooting it because I was going on a vacation two days later. Nothing would work so I wound up just sending it back and buying a camera from Best Buy (for cheaper than it was at Amazon. I need to start comparing prices before just ordering here since it seems the gap has closed on most things).

Reviews.Title: Basic digital camera at a good price.
Reviews.Author: Glenn
Reviews.Content: Takes good clear pictures. 3x zoom so not great but not bad. All in all a nice camera for what you pay. Have not tried the video function yet.

Reviews.Title: Samsung NV4 8.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Lin in NH
Reviews.Content: This camera was a gift for my daughter to replace one that died after using 3 years daily. She loved it and ran it right out of the box, despite being an updated model. This camera has the ability to turn off the record light so it is not noticeable when recording video. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a good output from an inexpensive camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
8-Megapixel Resolution - Up to 3264x2448 Stills, 800x592 AVI MPEG-4 Movie Clip at 20 fps with WAV Audio
34MB Internal Memory - We recommend purchase an optional 2GB SD or SD-HC Memory Card for practical usage
2.5 230K Color TFT LCD Monitor
Lens Focal - f =6.3 - 18.9mm (35mm film equivalent - 38-114mm) F No. F3.5 (Wide) - F4.6 (Tele)
Flash Modes - Auto, Auto & Red-eye reduction, Fill-in flash, Slow sync, Flash off, and Red eye fix
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NV4 8.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Silver)
